channel.title: Run client error
channel.description:
hi
i keep on getting an error when i try to run my client it says:
expetion in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffound error: client
help with this please[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 01:12:22 AM[/size][hr]i have got jdk 6.1 and jre 6.1
have i got the right software
(sorry for spelling errors)
